name: Eight Days
storyline: In one character's storyline, he attempts to get revenge on a mob syndicate. The other storyline would follow another character, a detective searching for the same mob syndicate, after he kidnaps his son. The two characters end up crossing paths, and eventually work together.
summary: First appearing as an unnamed tech demo at E3 2005, Eight Days was officially announced at the Sony E3 press conference before being canceled shortly after.
